doc.field: Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials

This series collects various uncataloged serials and newsletters mainly issued by large national organizations including the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees; Civil Service Employees Association; Civil Service Employees Association; District Council 1707 Shop Stewards; New York State Department of Labor; and New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University. Weekly and monthly newsletters document union advocacy at a national scale, providing significant coverage of changes in labor law -- collective bargaining; retiree rights; strike actions -- as well as documenting the day-to-day circumstances of particular unions, for example the election of union representatives, and divisions between organizations and rank and file groups.
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
